page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: I.J.ROPER-Head of Geography & Head of Middle School. 8.10 arrive @ Newport_see Headmaster write notices write letters 08.45_Staff briefing_09.00_See boys with problems _9.20_Teach geography or geology_10.35_break_10.50_teach_11.25 administration_12.00_Duke of Edinburgh Award group _12.40_lunch_12.55_ staffroom discussion with colleagues _13.10_see boys with problem or causing _13.20_ meet parents or administration _13.50_ teach _14.30_lesson preparation or marking_15.05_teach_15.40_supervise buses_16.00_finalise letters etc. 16.00_17.30_comittee meeting_17.30_ depart for home_2 hours marking each evening. Time in day-ON SITE 09.20 BREAKS 00.45 TIME WORKING @ HOME 2HRS+
